title: Drawing, "Designs for Table Lamps", 1980s
medium: Color marking pens, graphite on white paper
description: Three lamps arranged on page: two (one above the other) on left; one on right.  At upper left, lamp in form of yellow and black fish with tail outlined in red on black stem with circular base of turquoise with yellow spots; two turquoise water lines indicated behind lamp.  At lower left, curling snake in yellow and gold with circles of red dots on organic shape base.  At lower right, lamp shade in form of a red tree with yellow circles as fruit on blue ground edged in yellow with organic shape base, black cord and plug attached to base at lower right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Designs for Table Lamps", 1980s.
1980s. Color marking pens, graphite on white paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-303.
